attributes.action: Restart the process of passing the Desecration of War Memorials Bill.
attributes.additional_details: Our war memorials are key elements of our national heritage and remembrance. They are increasingly under threat and our police forces claim they do not have the powers to prevent their desecration. Passing the Desecration of War Memorials Bill would enable that.
attributes.background: I want the government to restart the process of passing the Desecration of War Memorials Bill.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/651614
